name: Kyn's Dreamworld
description:
THIS GAME IS A FINISHED PRODUCT!

I am making this game as an entrance exam so that I can study game developing.

----------------------------------------------------------

Story:

Kyn is lucid dreaming and he is suddenly in a dreamworld that changes every level, the only way to escape out of his sleep is to beat every level.

Can you beat the game and wake up?

------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

A or ARROW-LEFT to go left

D or ARROW-RIGHT to go right

Spacebar to Jump

------------------------------------------------------------

YES, THIS GAME ISN'T EASY, DONT GO RAGING IN COMMENTS >:(
